title: Clock
desc:
- Playable on <:red:1106234051129507932> and <:yellow:1106234135384699023>, or if the top 2 cards in the play pile have a matching color.
- Whenever a <:clocks:1171222463200379021> card is played, moves the Clocktower forward an hour.
- Once the clocktower has completed a full rotation, (12 hours) the player with the most cards is destroyed.
